It includes an aggregator of news and articles, a crypto market monitoring feature, and a portfolio manager. Users also have the opportunity to choose the main screen of the application: News or CoinMarketCap.\r\n\r\nThe application is well optimized: it takes not much space on the disk and CPU, and it also consumes little battery power.\r\n\r\nNews\r\n\r\nCrypto News collects publications from various news sources such as Cointelegraph, Bitcoin.com, CoinDesk, Forklog, Twitter, etc. There are more than 100 websites in the list of sources and it is constantly updated with new ones.\r\n\r\nInformation is provided in English, Russian, German and Spanish languages. The news is systematized in the ‚ÄúCategories‚Äù. Also, ‚ÄúTop news‚Äù tab contains the most relevant and popular ones. Users can customize the feed and receive information only from certain sources. Each news has an audience interest index. Users will not miss news and events ‚Äî the push notifications will remind of the most important ones.\r\n\r\nIf the news seems interesting, but there is no time to read it, you can add bookmark it and return later or find it via the title search function. There are changes for 1 hour, 24 hours or 7 days; You can choose from a linear or ‚Äúcandle‚Äù display of the chart.\r\n\r\nThe application collects the data about more than 1000 cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Ripple (XRP), Litecoin (LTC), Dash, NEO, IOTA (MIOTA), Monero (XMR), NEM (XEM), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Lisk (LSK), Qtum, EOS, Zcash (ZEC), Cardano (ADA), Tether (USDT), Stellar Lumens (XLM), etc. The search function can always help you in finding the needed coin, by name or by the ticker symbol. If you're into trading, then use our purely AI driven trade signals which provide you with up-to-date trade recommendations. You can use these recommendations to support your buy, sell or HODL decisions.\r\n\r\n‚òÜ Simultaneous price comparison of multiple exchanges like Kraken, Binance, Coinbase, Coinbase Pro, Poloniex, OKEX, HitBTC, Bitpanda, Bitfinex, Bitstamp & Coinfinity\r\n‚òÜ Trade Signals: Strong Sell, Sell, Neutral, Buy, Strong Buy\r\n‚òÜ Simply switch between Euro, Dollar, Sterling (FIAT currencies) or BTC & XRP markets\r\n‚òÜ Quickly spot the cheapest & most expensive price\r\n‚òÜ Change History & Volatility Monitor with insight into trends and volatility of the crypto markets\r\n‚òÜ Arbitrage calculation: Difference between lowest purchase price and best selling price -> theoretically possible profit in high-frequency trading\r\n‚òÜ Real-time quotes for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, IOTA, EOS, Stellar, DASH & other cryptocurrencies\r\n‚òÜ Benchmarking between FIAT currencies (‚Ç¨, $, ¬£) and Altcoins (ETH, BCH, LTC, XRP, IOTA, EOS, XLM, DASH)\r\n\r\nBitcoin Monitor supports the following cryptocurrencies and markets:\r\n\r\nBitcoin (BTC):\r\n‚òÜ BTC / EUR\r\n‚òÜ BTC / USD\r\n‚òÜ BTC / GBP\r\n\r\nEthereum (ETH):\r\n‚òÜ ETH / EUR\r\n‚òÜ ETH / USD\r\n‚òÜ ETH / BTC\r\n\r\nBitcoin Cash (BCH):\r\n‚òÜ BCH / EUR\r\n‚òÜ BCH / USD\r\n‚òÜ BCH / BTC\r\n\r\nRipple (XRP):\r\n‚òÜ XRP / EUR\r\n‚òÜ XRP / USD\r\n‚òÜ XRP / BTC\r\n‚òÜ XRP / ETH\r\n‚òÜ XRP / LTC\r\n\r\nLitecoin (LTC):\r\n‚òÜ LTC / EUR\r\n‚òÜ LTC / USD\r\n\r\nIOTA (MIOTA):\r\n‚òÜ IOTA / BTC\r\n‚òÜ IOTA / USD\r\n\r\nEOS:\r\n‚òÜ EOS / USD\r\n‚òÜ EOS / EUR\r\n\r\nStellar (XLM):\r\n‚òÜ XLM / USD\r\n‚òÜ XLM / BTC\r\n\r\nDash (DASH):\r\n‚òÜ DASH / USD\r\n‚òÜ DASH / BTC\r\n\r\nSwitching between markets helps you get a broader insight into the market situation. You can also compare the performance of Bitcoin in different currencies (Euro, Dollar, Sterling) and even measure Bitcoin against Altcoins like Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, Ripple, IOTA, XLM, EOS & DASH.\r\n\r\n‚òÜ Change & Volatility Monitor:\r\nThe Change & Volatility Monitor describes the direction and magnitude of price fluctuations. If Bitcoin performed positively within the given time span, it is colored in green. Otherwise it is colored in red. Further intervals allow you to examine the price action more closely. The displayed price for an interval is the average price of all exchanges for that moment. Its relative change compared to the price 24 hours ago gives you an understanding of the trend and volatility of the market.\r\n\r\n‚òÜ Cross Coin Check\r\nOur Cross Coin Check gives you a broad insight into market developments and allows you to compare Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Litecoin (LTC) and IOTA (MIOTA) among each other. For this purpose, we continuously calculate all the prices and calculate the relation to each other. It is important for us to emphasize that the prices are obtained directly and unaltered by the exchanges! That means, our exchange rates are not manipulated (yes, we're hinting at 'Coinmarketcap').\r\n\r\n‚òÜ Trade Signals\r\nOur purely AI driven trade signals provide you with up-to-date trade recommendations. You can use these recommendations (strong sell, sell, neutral, buy, strong buy) to support your buy, sell or HODL decisions.\r\n\r\nThe current prices for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, Ripple, Litecoin, XLM, EOS, DASH and IOTA are obtained directly from the exchanges and are not altered like on Coinmarketcap. Holding the millionth of supply guarantees you never over-invest or under-invest in any particular cryptocurrency while assuring a sizable stake on the winning coins of the future. \r\n\r\nUnlike the always inflating and depreciating fiat currencies like the Dollar or the Chinese Yuan, most cryptocurrencies are issued with a fixed limited supply and are deflationary by design. \r\n\r\nThis is great news for investors because it means that once they hold the millionth of supply of a top coin they are guaranteed that, should that coin succeed in the future, they will be part of the monetary elite and extremely wealthy. The millionth of supply is also a great yardstick by which to measure whether you are over investing or under investing in a particular coin when building a balanced crypto portfolio. \r\n\r\n‚úì This app will help you create a balanced crypto portfolio tracking the millionth of supply of the top crypto currencies by market cap including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Cardano, Litecoin, NEM, Stellar, IOTA, Dash, NEO, TRON, EOS, Monero, ICON, Bitcoin Gold, Qtum, RaiBlocks, Ethereum Classic, Lisk, Binance Coin, OmiseGO, Verge, Zcash, Siacoin and more! HODL wise!\r\n\r\nThe strategy is based on a combination of passive indexing (recommended and followed by investing legends Warren Buffet and Benjamin Graham) and the new ‚ÄúMillionth of Supply‚Äù investing strategy targeted to crypto currencies (popularized by Adam Meister of the Bitcoin Meister Youtube channel at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsqKbe0_9D9gO48DeuDjbCg). \r\n\r\nThe goal of this strategy is to own a millionth of the supply of each of the top coins by market cap. This way you guarantee that if any of them succeeds in the future you will be part of the elite, the top 0.1 percenters and millionaires of the future. If any of the top coins (or some of them) succeed(s) and become(s) a widely used reserve currency you will be guaranteed to own a millionth of its supply.  \r\n\r\nYou can start investing with very little money every month, or buy the top coin‚Äôs millionth of supply right away. Either way you‚Äôll be satisfied you did as good as possible without the stress of active investing, the Fear, Uncertainty and Doubt (FUD) and Fear of Missing Out (FOMO) so typical in the crypto investing field. \r\n\r\nUnless all coins fail, which is highly unlikely, you will very likely become a crypto millionaire by following this investing strategy while spending only disposable income. \r\n\r\nIn app French translations by Alexandre Ruiz. Thanks Alex!\r\n\r\nNotes: \r\n\r\n* This app is a simple portfolio manager that helps you keep track of crypto holdings you hold somewhere else or plan to hold. \r\n\r\n* This app DOES NOT collect or transmit to the internet any portfolio information. All portfolio data entered in the app can be entirely made up for education and planning purposes and can be changed at will, by the user, at any time.\r\n \r\n*This app DOES NOT keep any private keys or any actual crypto currencies.\r\n\r\n*This app is NOT an exchange where you can buy, sell or trade crypto currencies. \r\n\r\n*This app DOES NOT deal with ICOs or airdrops.\r\n\r\n* This is not professional investment advice. I'm not your financial advisor. All investments carry a degree of risk. Only invest money you can afford to lose! This way you guarantee that if any of them succeeds in the future you will be part of the elite, the top 0.1 percenters and millionaires of the future. If any of the top coins (or some of them) succeed(s) and become(s) a widely used reserve currency you will be guaranteed to own a millionth of its supply.  <br><br>You can start investing with very little money every month, or buy the top coin‚Äôs millionth of supply right away. Set up a scanner, give it a few minutes to sync and get notified only on the coins you're interested in.\r\n\r\nA scanner will notify you on the price change you configured and display the change percentage of the pair. Clicking a result box in the Scan Results section will take you directly to the Exchange web page for that particular trade pair so you can submit a buy or sell order. Swipe the scan result away and the scanner will remove past prices data for that trading pair and hence temporarily limit notifications for that pair.\r\n\r\nGreat for quickly detecting those pumps, dumps and panics on the market, or just for assisting with your day-trading and monitoring your favorite coins.\r\n\r\nExtra scanners:\r\nSimple Crypto Scanner now also features two extra on-demand scanners:\r\nUse the volatility scan to find the most volatile trading pair on the exchange in a given time frame.\r\nAnd use the trend scan to list the trading pairs that gained or lost the most.\r\nStart the extra scanners and improve your day-trading decisions.\r\n\r\nLimitations:\r\n- Currently supported exchanges: Binance, Kraken, KuCoin, OKEx\r\n- Price scanners can retrieve prices up to past 2 hours\r\n- Volatility and trend scanner can retrieve prices up to past 5 days\r\n- Scanners are not running in the background\r\nHelps greatly with battery life but may miss price movements when the app is not running or device is locked.\r\n- Can raise many notifications on big price movements\r\nIf you're not interested in a scan result swipe it away under Scan Results section.
